means: 米诺鱼（鲤科淡水小鱼）( minnow的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: In the middle of the day he found two minnows in a large pool.
sentence.Network_cn: 中午时分,他在一个大水坑里发现了两条鲦鱼.

sentence.Network_en: In the evening he caught three more minnows, eating two and saving the third for breakfast.
sentence.Network_cn: 黄昏时候,他又捉到了三条鲦鱼, 他吃掉两条,留下一条作第二天的早饭.

sentence.Network_en: England play minnows Andorra on Saturday and Macedonia on Wednesday 6 September.
sentence.Network_cn: 英格兰队将在本周六和下周三分别迎战安道尔和马其顿.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The remaining minnows are likely to swallowed up in future ., 而剩下的小鱼小虾将来可能也会被吞并.
male minnows became feminized : their sperm production was delayed and they started producing eggs .雄性黑头呆鱼变的雌性化了：它们的精子生产被延迟，而且开始产卵。

entry.tran: 鲦鱼，米诺鱼(一种极小的淡水鱼)
entry.def: A minnow is a very small fish that lives in lakes and rivers.
